exercises.name: Wall Push-Up
exercises.description: Push-up performed against a wall, great for beginners
exercises.instructions: Stand facing a wall at arm's length. Place palms flat against the wall at shoulder height and width. Bend elbows to bring chest toward wall, then push back to start.

exercises.name: Kneeling Push-Up
exercises.description: Push-up from knees, easier than full push-up
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees with hands slightly wider than shoulders. Lower chest toward floor by bending elbows, keeping core tight. Push back up to start.

exercises.name: Push Ups
exercises.description: Classic bodyweight pushing exercise
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulders. Lower chest toward floor, keeping body straight. Push back up to start position.

exercises.name: Pike Push-Ups
exercises.description: Push-up with hips raised, targets shoulders
exercises.instructions: Start in downward dog position with hips high. Bend elbows to lower head toward floor between hands. Push back up to start.

exercises.name: Archer Push-Ups
exercises.description: Asymmetric push-up shifting weight to one arm
exercises.instructions: Start in wide push-up position. Lower toward one hand while extending the other arm straight. Push back up and alternate sides.

exercises.name: Kneeling Plank
exercises.description: Plank from knees, easier core engagement
exercises.instructions: Start on forearms and knees. Keep body in straight line from head to knees. Hold position while breathing steadily.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Foundational core stability exercise
exercises.instructions: Start on forearms and toes with body in straight line. Keep core engaged and hips level. Hold position while breathing steadily.

exercises.name: Three-Point Plank
exercises.description: Plank with one limb raised for added challenge
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Lift one foot or hand off ground while maintaining straight body line. Alternate limbs.

exercises.name: Two-Point Plank
exercises.description: Plank with opposite arm and leg raised
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Lift opposite arm and leg simultaneously while keeping hips level. Alternate sides.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Fundamental lower body exercise
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower hips back and down as if sitting in a chair. Keep chest up and knees tracking over toes. Stand back up.

exercises.name: Archer Squat
exercises.description: Wide stance squat shifting weight to one leg
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet wide apart. Shift weight to one leg and bend that knee while keeping the other leg straight. Alternate sides.

exercises.name: Pistol Squat
exercises.description: Single-leg squat requiring strength and balance
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg with other leg extended forward. Lower into deep squat on standing leg while keeping extended leg off ground. Stand back up.

exercises.name: Dragon Squat
exercises.description: Advanced single-leg squat with rear leg crossed behind
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg. Cross other leg behind and lower into squat while keeping rear leg elevated. Stand back up.

exercises.name: Wall Hand-Stand
exercises.description: Handstand with wall support for balance
exercises.instructions: Place hands on floor near wall. Kick up to handstand with heels resting against wall. Hold position with arms straight.

exercises.name: Handstand
exercises.description: Freestanding balance on hands
exercises.instructions: Place hands on floor shoulder-width apart. Kick up to balance on hands with body straight. Use micro-adjustments in fingers and wrists to maintain balance.

exercises.name: Press Handstand
exercises.description: Pressing up to handstand from standing or straddle
exercises.instructions: From standing or straddle position, place hands on floor and press hips up and over shoulders to reach handstand without jumping.

exercises.name: Handstand Push-Up
exercises.description: Push-up in handstand position
exercises.instructions: Start in handstand against wall. Lower head toward floor by bending elbows. Push back up to straight arms.

exercises.name: L-Sit
exercises.description: Seated position with legs extended, body supported on hands
exercises.instructions: Sit with legs extended. Place hands beside hips and press down to lift body off ground. Keep legs straight and parallel to floor.

exercises.name: Crow Pose
exercises.description: Arm balance with knees resting on upper arms
exercises.instructions: Squat with hands on floor. Lean forward and place knees on backs of upper arms. Shift weight forward until feet lift off ground.

exercises.name: Elbow Lever
exercises.description: Horizontal balance on bent arm
exercises.instructions: Place one elbow into hip crease. Lean forward and balance body horizontally with arm supporting weight. Keep body straight.

exercises.name: Single Arm Elbow Lever
exercises.description: Elbow lever balanced on one arm only
exercises.instructions: Perform elbow lever but remove support of free arm, balancing entirely on one elbow planted in hip.

exercises.name: Toe Touch
exercises.description: Standing forward fold to improve hamstring flexibility
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet together. Hinge at hips and reach toward toes. Keep legs straight and relax into the stretch.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: Hip extension exercise for glutes and hamstrings
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat. Press through heels to lift hips toward ceiling. Squeeze glutes at top, then lower.

exercises.name: Bridge Hold
exercises.description: Full back bridge position
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with hands by ears, fingers pointing toward shoulders. Press up to arch back, lifting hips and chest. Hold position.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Raise
exercises.description: Core exercise lifting legs while lying down
exercises.instructions: Lie flat on back with legs extended. Keeping legs straight, lift them toward ceiling. Lower slowly without touching floor.

exercises.name: Calf Raise
exercises.description: Standing heel raises for calf strength
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Rise up onto balls of feet, lifting heels high. Lower slowly and repeat.

exercises.name: Reverse Nordic Curl
exercises.description: Quad-focused exercise leaning back from kneeling
exercises.instructions: Kneel with body upright. Slowly lean back, keeping hips extended and body straight. Use quads to control descent and return.

exercises.name: Dead Hang
exercises.description: Hanging from a bar to build grip strength and shoulder stability
exercises.instructions: Grab a pull-up bar with both hands. Hang with arms fully extended, shoulders engaged. Keep core tight and breathe steadily.

exercises.name: Scapular Pull
exercises.description: Shoulder blade activation while hanging
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with arms straight. Without bending elbows, pull shoulder blades down and together to lift body slightly. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Australian Pull-Up
exercises.description: Horizontal pulling exercise with feet on ground
exercises.instructions: Set bar at waist height. Lie under bar and grab with overhand grip. Keep body straight and pull chest to bar. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Negative Pull-Up
exercises.description: Lowering phase of pull-up to build strength
exercises.instructions: Jump or step up to top pull-up position with chin over bar. Lower yourself as slowly as possible with control.

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.description: Classic vertical pulling exercise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with hands shoulder-width apart. Pull body up until chin clears bar. Lower with control to full hang.

exercises.name: Chin-Up
exercises.description: Pull-up with underhand grip, bicep emphasis
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with palms facing you. Pull body up until chin clears bar. Lower with control to full hang.

exercises.name: Wide-Grip Pull-Up
exercises.description: Pull-up with wider hand placement for back development
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with hands wider than shoulders. Pull chest toward bar. Lower with control to full hang.

exercises.name: Archer Pull-Up
exercises.description: Asymmetric pull-up shifting weight to one arm
exercises.instructions: Start in pull-up position. Pull up while shifting weight to one arm, extending the other arm. Alternate sides.

exercises.name: Typewriter Pull-Up
exercises.description: Horizontal movement at top of pull-up
exercises.instructions: Pull up to bar. While maintaining height, shift body side to side toward each hand. Lower with control.

exercises.name: One-Arm Pull-Up Negative
exercises.description: Single-arm lowering phase for advanced strength
exercises.instructions: Pull up with both arms. Release one hand and lower slowly with one arm. Alternate sides.

exercises.name: One-Arm Pull-Up
exercises.description: Elite single-arm vertical pull
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with one hand. Pull body up until chin clears bar using only one arm. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Bench Dip
exercises.description: Tricep dip using a bench or chair
exercises.instructions: Sit on bench edge with hands beside hips. Extend legs and lower body by bending elbows. Push back up.

exercises.name: Parallel Bar Support
exercises.description: Static hold in top dip position
exercises.instructions: Mount parallel bars with arms straight, supporting full body weight. Keep shoulders down and core tight.

exercises.name: Negative Dip
exercises.description: Lowering phase of dip to build strength
exercises.instructions: Start in top dip position. Lower body slowly by bending elbows until shoulders reach elbow height. Reset to top.

exercises.name: Dip
exercises.description: Classic parallel bar dip for triceps and chest
exercises.instructions: Start in support position on bars. Lower body by bending elbows until shoulders reach elbow height. Push back up.

exercises.name: Ring Dip
exercises.description: Dip performed on gymnastics rings for added instability
exercises.instructions: Support yourself on rings. Lower body by bending elbows while maintaining ring stability. Push back up.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.description: Core stability exercise on back
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with arms extended toward ceiling, knees bent at 90 degrees. Lower opposite arm and leg while keeping lower back pressed to floor. Alternate sides.

exercises.name: Hollow Body Hold
exercises.description: Core compression hold creating banana shape
exercises.instructions: Lie on back. Press lower back to floor and lift shoulders and legs slightly off ground. Keep arms extended overhead.

exercises.name: Arch Hold
exercises.description: Back extension hold, opposite of hollow body
exercises.instructions: Lie face down. Lift chest and legs off ground simultaneously, creating an arch shape. Keep arms extended forward.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: Lateral core stability exercise
exercises.instructions: Lie on side with forearm on ground. Lift hips to create straight line from head to feet. Hold position, then switch sides.

exercises.name: Hanging Knee Raise
exercises.description: Hanging core exercise lifting knees
exercises.instructions: Hang from pull-up bar. Lift knees toward chest by engaging core. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.description: Advanced hanging core exercise with straight legs
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar. Keep legs straight and lift toward horizontal. Lower with control without swinging.

exercises.name: Toes-to-Bar
exercises.description: Hanging core exercise bringing toes to bar
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar. Lift straight legs all the way up to touch toes to bar. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Tuck L-Sit
exercises.description: L-sit with knees tucked, easier variation
exercises.instructions: Sit with hands beside hips. Press down to lift body while bringing knees to chest. Hold with body off ground.

exercises.name: Copenhagen Plank
exercises.description: Advanced side plank variation for adductors
exercises.instructions: Position top leg on elevated surface. Bottom leg hovers. Support body on forearm creating straight line. Intense adductor work.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.description: Single-leg exercise in split stance
exercises.instructions: Step forward into split stance. Lower back knee toward ground while keeping front shin vertical. Push back to standing. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: Single-leg squat with rear foot elevated
exercises.instructions: Place rear foot on elevated surface behind you. Lower into single-leg squat on front leg. Push back up.

exercises.name: Single Leg Deadlift
exercises.description: Balance and hamstring exercise on one leg
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg. Hinge at hip and reach toward ground while extending free leg behind. Return to standing.

exercises.name: Shrimp Squat
exercises.description: Single-leg squat with rear leg bent behind
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg, hold other foot behind you. Lower into deep single-leg squat. Stand back up.

exercises.name: Jump Squat
exercises.description: Explosive squat variation for power
exercises.instructions: Perform a squat then explode upward into a jump. Land softly and immediately lower into next squat.

exercises.name: Nordic Curl
exercises.description: Advanced hamstring exercise from kneeling
exercises.instructions: Kneel with feet anchored. Slowly lower torso forward by extending at knees while keeping hips straight. Use hamstrings to control descent.

exercises.name: Single Leg Calf Raise
exercises.description: Calf raise on one leg for increased difficulty
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg. Rise up onto ball of foot, lifting heel high. Lower with control. Switch legs.

exercises.name: Skin the Cat
exercises.description: Full rotation hanging from bar for shoulder mobility
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar. Tuck knees and rotate backward through hang until you're looking at ground upside down. Reverse the motion.

exercises.name: German Hang
exercises.description: Extreme shoulder extension stretch while hanging
exercises.instructions: From bar hang, rotate backward into deep shoulder extension with palms facing forward at bottom of rotation. Hold stretch.

exercises.name: Wrist Mobility
exercises.description: Wrist circles and extensions for joint health
exercises.instructions: Perform wrist circles in both directions. Press palms together with fingers pointing down. Gently stretch wrists in all directions.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: Spinal mobility exercise
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, alternate between arching back (cow) and rounding spine (cat). Move slowly and breathe with each position.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Resting stretch for back and shoulders
exercises.instructions: Kneel and sit back on heels. Extend arms forward and lower chest toward ground. Relax and breathe deeply.

exercises.name: Front Lever Tuck
exercises.description: Horizontal hold with knees tucked
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar. Pull hips up and tuck knees to chest while keeping back horizontal. Hold position.

exercises.name: Front Lever
exercises.description: Advanced horizontal hold with straight body
exercises.instructions: From hanging position, pull body horizontal with back facing ground. Keep body perfectly straight and parallel to ground.

exercises.name: Back Lever Tuck
exercises.description: Inverted horizontal hold with knees tucked
exercises.instructions: From hanging, rotate backward and tuck knees to chest while keeping shoulders horizontal. Hold position.

exercises.name: Back Lever
exercises.description: Advanced inverted horizontal hold
exercises.instructions: From hanging, rotate backward into horizontal position with chest facing ground. Keep body straight and parallel to ground.

exercises.name: Planche Lean
exercises.description: Forward lean building planche strength
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Shift weight forward over hands, lifting heels and leaning shoulders past wrists.

exercises.name: Tuck Planche
exercises.description: Planche hold with knees tucked
exercises.instructions: Lean forward on hands and tuck knees to chest. Lift feet off ground and balance with shoulders far forward.

exercises.name: Planche
exercises.description: Elite horizontal push hold
exercises.instructions: Balance on hands with body parallel to ground, legs straight. Maintain perfect horizontal position.

exercises.name: Muscle-Up
exercises.description: Dynamic movement combining pull-up and dip
exercises.instructions: Pull up explosively on bar. As chest reaches bar, transition by rolling wrists over and pressing into dip. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Wall Walk
exercises.description: Walking feet up wall from plank
exercises.instructions: Start in plank facing away from wall. Walk feet up wall while walking hands closer to wall until nearly vertical. Walk back down.
